com.sun.xml.wss
Class SamlAssertionHeaderBlock

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.sun.xml.wss.impl.SecurityHeaderBlockImpl
        |
        +--com.sun.xml.wss.SamlAssertionHeaderBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.w3c.dom.Element, javax.xml.soap.Node, org.w3c.dom.Node, SecurityHeaderBlock, SecurityToken, javax.xml.soap.SOAPElement
public class SamlAssertionHeaderBlock
extends SecurityHeaderBlockImpl
implements SecurityToken

The schema definition for a SAML Assertion is as follows:

<element name="Assertion" type="saml:AssertionType"/> <complexType name="AssertionType"> <sequence> <element ref="saml:Conditions" minOccurs="0"/> <element ref="saml:Advice" minOccurs="0"/> <choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <element ref="saml:Statement"/> <element ref="saml:SubjectStatement"/> <element ref="saml:AuthenticationStatement"/> <element ref="saml:AuthorizationDecisionStatement"/> <element ref="saml:AttributeStatement"/> </choice> <element ref="ds:Signature" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> <attribute name="MajorVersion" type="integer" use="required"/> <attribute name="MinorVersion" type="integer" use="required"/> <attribute name="AssertionID" type="saml:IDType" use="required"/> <attribute name="Issuer" type="string" use="required"/> <attribute name="IssueInstant" type="dateTime" use="required"/> </complexType>

SamlAssertionHeaderBlock

public SamlAssertionHeaderBlock(java.lang.String assertionID,
                                java.lang.String issuer,
                                java.util.Date issueInstant,
                                com.sun.xml.wss.saml.assertion.Conditions conditions,
                                com.sun.xml.wss.saml.assertion.Advice advice,
                                java.util.Set statements)
                         throws XWSSecurityException
Constructs a new SamlAssertionHeaderBlock with the given parameters.

Parameters:
assertionID - a uniqe id.
issuer - the assertion autority that issued the assertion.
issueInstant - the instant the assertion was issued.
conditions - conditions under which the assertion is valid/invalid.
advice - additional advice surrounding the assertion.
statements - assertion statements.
Throws:
XWSSecurityException - when the parameters can not result in the successful creation of a valid assertion.

isTimeValid

public boolean isTimeValid()
Gets the validity of the assertion evaluating its conditions if specified.

Returns:
false if conditions is invalid based on it lying between NotBefore (current time inclusive) and NotOnOrAfter (current time exclusive) values and true otherwise or if no conditions specified.
